rules.description: Where Tier 1 UHQ is true and is specific or Territory Code (Partner) is blank or Account Name is a holding account then set to True
This workflow auto sets the Joint Selling Program to true for certain accounts
When the Account becomes a Customer, set the Sub-State field to blank.

rules.fullName: PGi-Set Sub-Status field to be Assigned
rules.description: Where any “Count of Recent” fields are not 0… AND Current Account Owner is NOT an Inactive User Then change to Assigned
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), !CONTAINS( Owner.LastName , "x-"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Prospect"), OR( Count_of_Recent_Tasks__c > 0, Count_of_Recent_Events__c > 0, Count_of_Recent_Attachments__c > 0, Count_of_Recent_Contacts__c > 0, Count_of_Recent_Leads__c > 0, Count_of_Recent_Notes__c > 0, Count_of_Recent_Opportunities__c > 0, Ownership_Change_Date__c >= TODAY()-90 ) )

rules.fullName: PGi-Set Sub-Status field to be Inactive
rules.description: Where all ‘Count of Recent’ fields are 0…. OR Ownership Change Date field is blank or older than the past 90 days…OR Current Account Owner is an Inactive User Then change to Inactive
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Prospect"), OR( CONTAINS(Owner.LastName, "x-"), AND( Count_of_Recent_Tasks__c = 0, Count_of_Recent_Events__c =0, Count_of_Recent_Attachments__c = 0, Count_of_Recent_Contacts__c = 0, Count_of_Recent_Leads__c = 0, Count_of_Recent_Notes__c = 0, Count_of_Recent_Opportunities__c = 0, OR( Ownership_Change_Date__c < TODAY()-90, ISBLANK(Ownership_Change_Date__c) ))))

rules.fullName: PGi-Set value of Ownership Change to Today
rules.description: Set value of Ownership Change to Today
Convert Ultimate Parent lookup field to text value for sharing rules

rules.fullName: PGi-Update ABM %7C Last PES and ABM Last Change Date
rules.description: Update ABM | Last PES and ABM Last Change Date via workflow where:
For non-partner accounts the Account Name should always be the same as the D&B Company Name if the Account is cleaned and matched to a D&B record

Where Billed Rev is not equal to 0.... OR Where Territory Code (Partner) is not blank....OR Where Type = End User Carrier or End User Resller AND Total Closed Won Ops is 1 or greater Then change to Customer

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7) OR (2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 1 AND 6)
rules.description: Billed Revenue = 0 OR blank..... & Territory Code (Partner) = blank.... & Type <> End User Carrier OR End User Reseller Not RT ..OR.. Territory Code (Partner) = blank.... & Type = End User Carrier OR End User Reseller…& Total Closed Won Ops is 0
If the Lead or Account have a Clean Status = Skipped then to update the Clean Status field back to blank.
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISPICKVAL(CleanStatus, "Skipped"), Id <> '001300000106U1c', Id <> '001300000106U2C', Id <> '001300000106U2G')

rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Suspend_Account__c), PRIORVALUE(Suspend_Account__c) = True, Suspend_Account__c = False, RecordTypeId = "0121B000001q5WT" )

rules.fullName: RT_Logo Approved for Use Box checked on new Accounts

This is to track the change of the Renewal Manager on the Account Team.
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "iMC Account", PRIORVALUE(Renewal_Manager__c) <> Renewal_Manager__c || ISCHANGED(OwnerId ) )

rules.description: This will change the Account Status to Customer for all Accounts that have the Active Account flag checked.
This will change the Account Status to Customer Cancelled when the Active Account flag UNchecked and the previous value was checked.
rules.formula: RecordType.Name = "iMC Account" && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Customer Cancelled"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Prospect"))&& Active_Account__c = False

rules.description: This will change the Account Type from blank to Prospect, when Type field is blank.
Is Account Active field is TRUE, mark ZD Sync Active field as YES.

rules.fullName: iMC - Account%2C ZD Sync Not Active
rules.description: Is Account Active field is TRUE, mark ZD Sync Active field as NO.
